mapper.sql:
FROM oyMember a LEFT JOIN oymbPhone f on f.oympDefaultNy=1 AND f.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbEmail g on g.oymeDefaultNy=1 AND g.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND a.oymbDelNy = 1 AND a.oymbDelNy = 0
AND a.oymbGenderCd = 3 AND a.oymbGenderCd = 4 AND a.oymbGenderCd = 5
AND a.oymbGradeCd = 137 AND a.oymbGradeCd = 138 AND a.oymbGradeCd = 139 AND a.oymbGradeCd = 140
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scOymbName},'%')
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND a.oymbNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
AND a.oymbSeq AND a.oymbId AND f.oympNumber AND g.oymeEmailAccount
AND f.oympTelecomCd = 28 AND f.oympTelecomCd = 29 AND f.oympTelecomCd = 30 AND f.oympTelecomCd = 31
AND g.oymeEmailDomainCd = 35 AND g.oymeEmailDomainCd = 36 AND g.oymeEmailDomainCd = 37 AND g.oymeEmailDomainCd = 144
mapper.select:
SELECT a.oymbSeq , a.oymbName , a.oymbId , a.oymbGenderCd ,(select oycdName from oyCode where oycdSeq = a.oymbGenderCd) as oymbGender , a.oymbGradeCd ,(select oycdName from oyCode where oycdSeq = a.oymbGradeCd) as oymbGrade , a.oymbDelNy , f.oympTelecomCd ,(select oycdName from oyCode where oycdSeq = f.oympTelecomCd) as oympTelecom , f.oympNumber , g.oymeEmailFull , g.oymeEmailAccount , g.oymeEmailDomainCd ,(select oycdName from oyCode where oycdSeq = g.oymeEmailDomainCd) as oymeEmailDomain
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
